### shouldScheduleAdjacent() {#af5da450a1411e5b2e09527cb36568ff1}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["static"]}>
Check if the instr pair, FirstMI and SecondMI, should be fused together.

Given SecondMI, when FirstMI is unspecified, then check if SecondMI may be part of a fused pair at all.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumacrofusion-cpp/#l00026">26</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpumacrofusion-cpp">AMDGPUMacroFusion.cpp</a>.
